name: 2 Cool 4 School
description:
2 Cool 4 School is a game prototype made during a 1 day Game Jam.

Level Designer: HappyAviala
2D Artist: ThatSicklyPup

Sneak around in school and wreak havoc without getting caught by the night guard! 

You can yeet garbage cans, spray graffiti on paintings, break windows and hide in lockers.

Keyboard Controls:

Move - WASD

Interact - E

Sneak - Shift

Pause menu - Esc
